caseTitle: Abbas Haider Naqvi and another v. Federation of Pakistan through Secretary, Cabinet Division, Islamabad and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Scope of Section 265-K/249-A CrPC as to acquitting an accused at any stage of the case and essential ingredients of the offence of criminal breach of trust as defined in Section 405 and 409 PPC and in Section 9(a)(x)&(xi) of the NAB Ordinance, explained.
